title: Summer Monteys-Fullam enjoys a rickshaw ride during fashion event in Machester
text:
She recently slammed rumours she would be appearing on I'm A Celebrity... Get Me Out Of Here!

But Summer Monteys-Fullam, 24, was still hot on the party scene as she arrived at the VIP House of Klarna pop up shop on King Street, Manchester on Thursday night.

The former flame of Bake Off judge Paul Hollywood kept things super chic in an all-black ensemble as she enjoyed a rickshaw ride.

There she is! Summer Monteys-Fullam, 24, was still hot on the party scene as she arrived at the VIP House of Klarna pop up shop on King Street, Manchester on Thursday night

Summer looked sensational in a tight black top which fell off her shoulders. She teamed it with a pair of skinny black jeans and boosted her height in brown suede boots.

The beauty wrapped up against the rainy weather with a black padded coat, and styled her locks in a high ponytail while opting for a glamorous coat of make-up.

Summer has been throwing herself into work while balancing a busy life on London's social scene over the last couple of weeks.

She has recently hired an agent after media interest has whipped up around her, and has teased that she will be auditioning for acting roles in the coming weeks.

Riding along: The former flame of Bake Off judge Paul Hollywood kept things super chic in an all-black ensemble as she enjoyed a rickshaw ride

Fashionista: Summer looked sensational in a tight black top which fell off her shoulders. She teamed it with a pair of skinny black jeans and boosted her height in brown suede boots

Summer took a brief late-summer trip abroad with her sister where she was seen scrutinising a script, while sunbathing, and teasing that exciting things are on the cards for her.

Although rumours are rife she will appear on the forthcoming season of I'm A Celebrity... Get Me Out Of Here! she appeared to brush off the suggestion when she appeared on the radio last week.

Asked whether she would sign on to reality TV, she said - after a very long pause: 'No. I am focusing on the options in front of me.'

She specifically mentioned Love Island, claiming: 'No, it’s just not for me. I'd miss my animals too much.'

Wow: Summer styled her locks in a high ponytail while opting for a glamorous coat of make-up

Summer insisted on Thursday night that she has merely found herself in a situation where 'doors are opening' for her and is 'looking at her options'.

She said: 'It’s been an adventure and I have taken it in my stride. I am just true to me and myself. I have amazing family and friends. But it's scary and daunting.'

Summer went on: 'I didn’t ask for this, I didn’t ask for these doors to be opened. I was sucked into it – in a good way. I need to see what my options are.'

She teased that TV presenting and acting are on the cards: 'I’m excited to see where it would take me. I want to get my ducks in a row. I’d love to do something with my animals. They are my passion.'

'No, it’s just not for me': She recently slammed rumours she would be appearing on I'm A Celebrity ... Get Me Out Of Here!
description: Summer Monteys-Fullam, 24, was still hot on the party scene as she arrived at the VIP House of Klarna pop up shop on King Street, Machester on Thursday night.
